Header: More Officers & Other Ranks Join Meditation Practices
Content: A meditation programme, organized by the Directorate of Psychological Operations to raise spiritual standards and mental peace among Officers and Other Ranks of the armed forces, had one more session at Kanduboda, ‘Bavunseth Manasika Sevana Vipassana Bhavana’ Centre on Thursday (5). A group of 3 Officers and 77 Other Ranks, including 3 Officers and 17 sailors serving in the Sri Lanka Navy participated in the sessions. Ven. Diyasenpura Wimala Thero conducted those meditation sessions.
